product_overview: ManowZab Sales (SalesPilot) is a real-time sales and customer management system designed for small to medium-sized businesses. It offers comprehensive sales tracking, customer data management, multi-payment support, and insightful analytics through a user-friendly interface backed by Firebase cloud services.
core_goals: Provide real-time sales data tracking and visualization.
Enable secure and efficient management of customer information.
Support multiple payment methods including Transfer and COD.
Allow Excel file import for COD data and export for reporting.
Ensure seamless user authentication and data security.
Deliver a responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop devices.
key_features: Dashboard with real-time sales overview, summary cards, time filters, and sales charts.
Transfer Sales Entry form with date/time picker, auto-generated order numbers, customer autocomplete, and slip URL upload.
COD Excel import feature supporting multi-file drag-and-drop, data validation, and preview before saving.
Comprehensive All Sales Management with advanced filters, summary cards, clickable customer names, delete action, and Excel export.
Full CRUD operations for customer management with modal forms and real-time search.
Detailed Customer Profile view showing customer info, purchase statistics, and purchase history.
Firebase Email/Password Authentication with protected routes and error handling.
Responsive main layout with desktop sidebar and mobile bottom navigation including logout and app version display.
Pull-to-refresh component for mobile manual data refresh.
Reusable sales chart component utilizing Chart.js for visualization.
user_flow_summary: User logs in via Firebase Email/Password authentication with loading and error states.
From dashboard, user selects time range to view sales summary and trends via charts and latest transactions.
User navigates to Transfer Sales Entry to record transfer payments using an intuitive form and views recent transfer records.
User accesses Import COD feature to drag-and-drop Excel files, previews data, validates entries, and confirms to save data.
User filters and browses all sales records with options to delete entries and export data to Excel.
User manages customers by adding, editing, deleting, and searching customer information through modal dialogs and live tables.
User views detailed customer profiles with purchase stats and history for insights.
Logout is available from the main layout, maintaining session security and navigation.
validation_criteria: All core features function correctly across supported modern browsers.
Authentication securely restricts access to protected routes and data.
Data fetched and displayed on dashboard and views update in real-time or upon manual refresh.
Excel import correctly parses, validates, previews, and saves COD data without errors.
Sales and customer CRUD operations persist accurately to Firebase Firestore.
Filters and pagination handle data correctly with user inputs.
UI is responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints with consistent styling.
Error handling and alerts display appropriately for user actions and failures.
Exported Excel files contain accurate and formatted sales data.
Performance criteria for load times, lazy loading, and smooth UI transitions are met.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Real-time sales overview dashboard with summary cards showing total sales, orders, transfer amount, and COD amount. Includes time range filters (today, last 7 days, last 30 days, this month, last month, select month) and sales chart visualization. Displays recent 10 transactions.

features.name: Transfer Sales Entry
features.description: Form to record transfer payment sales with date/time picker, auto-generated order number (TRF-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS), customer name with autocomplete suggestions, amount input, and optional slip URL. Shows 10 most recent transfer records.

features.name: COD Import
features.description: Excel file import feature for COD data with drag-and-drop support. Uses ExcelJS to parse .xlsx/.xls files, validates data (date, customer name, amount), shows preview with summary stats (total items, files processed, total amount), and confirms before saving to Firebase.

features.name: All Sales Management
features.description: Comprehensive sales list view with advanced filtering (all, custom date range, select month). Shows summary cards with total sales and transfer vs COD breakdown. Sales table displays date/time, order number, customer name (clickable), type badge, amount, evidence, and delete action. Supports Excel export.

features.name: Customer Management
features.description: Full CRUD operations for customer data. Features include add new customer, edit existing customer, delete customer, and real-time search. Customer data includes name (required), phone number, address, and notes. Uses modal form for create/edit.

features.name: Customer Detail
features.description: Detailed customer profile page showing customer information, purchase statistics (total orders, total purchase amount, latest order), and complete purchase history table with date, order number, type, and amount.

features.name: Authentication
features.description: Firebase Email/Password authentication with protected routes. Login page with modern UI, version display, loading state, and error handling. Router guards prevent unauthorized access.

features.name: Main Layout
features.description: Responsive main application layout with desktop sidebar navigation and mobile bottom navigation. Shows app version in sidebar. Includes logout functionality.

features.name: Pull to Refresh
features.description: Touch-enabled pull-to-refresh component for manual data refresh on mobile devices.

features.name: Sales Chart Component
features.description: Reusable bar chart component using Chart.js and vue-chartjs to visualize sales data. Shows stacked bars for Transfer and COD amounts with data labels.

features.name: Sales Store
features.description: Pinia state management store for sales data with state (sales array, loading, filters, lastFetchTime), getters (totalSales, totalOrders, totalTransfer, totalCOD, summaryByDate, recentSales, salesWithDates), and actions (fetchSales, updateFilters, resetFilters, clearSales).

features.name: Sales Service
features.description: Firebase Firestore service layer providing functions for sales and customer data operations including getAllSales, createSale, deleteSale, getAllCustomers, createCustomer, updateCustomer, deleteCustomer, and getCustomerSales.

features.name: Firebase Configuration
features.description: Firebase initialization and configuration with Firestore and Authentication setup using environment variables.

features.name: Router Configuration
features.description: Vue Router setup with hash history mode, protected routes using authentication guards, and lazy-loaded components for code splitting.
